sections.text: Achyuta Rao is survived by his wife Anuradha Rao, who stood by him in every activity of his, whether it was business related or activism. She was his pillar from the very beginning of their marriage and was the reason behind his strength in his activism.
His son, Srikar Aditya is an L&D professional and his daughter in law Anusha is an HR professional.
part from them, he is survived by five brothers, Sudhakar Rao, Sudarshan Rao, PSM Rao, Madhava Rao and Sridhar; and three sisters Radha, Arundhati and Vijaya.
